function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exaggerated panic related to COVID-19 due to social media posts","Impact":"Increased anxiety and panic among users, leading to negative mental health outcomes","Mitigation":"Implement fact-checking measures and promote accurate information dissemination","Technologies":"Social media algorithms for detecting fake news and promoting verified sources","People":"Social media users, general public","Owner":"Social media platforms, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Spread of fake news related to COVID-19 on social media","Impact":"Misinformation leading to panic and confusion, potential disregard for official guidelines","Mitigation":"Promote media literacy, fact-checking, and enforcement of content guidelines","Technologies":"AI-powered fake news detection tools, media education campaigns","People":"Social media users, general public","Owner":"Social media platforms, governments, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Influence of social media on decision-makers leading to frequent changes in proposed legislation","Impact":"Instability and inconsistency in public policies, potential negative impact on public health measures","Mitigation":"Promote evidence-based decision-making, engage decision-makers with credible sources and expert opinions","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for monitoring public sentiment, communication platforms for engaging decision-makers","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, general public","Owner":"Government, public health institutions"}]}
